channel.title: Listes, chaines et visualisation des données :: 420-SN1-RE
channel.description: import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # Données temperatures = [ [15, 16, 14, 14, 17, 18, 19], # Ville A [22, 23, 21, 20, 24, 25, 26], # Ville B [5, 7, 6, 6, 8, 9, 7], # Ville C [10, 11, 12, 10, 13, 14, 15] # Ville D ] villes = ["Ville A", "Ville B", "Ville C", "Ville D"] jours = ["Lun", "Mar", "Mer", "Jeu", "Ven", "Sam", "Dim"] # 1.
